name: Bad, Bad Zoo
description:
It's opening week at your zoo and all that's left to do is get the animals. And maybe build some paths for your guests. I suppose some fences wouldn't hurt, now that I think about it.

At night, you have six turns to draw a randomly selected shape with an animal, path, or a fence. When the day arrives, your guests arrive on any paths connected to a side of the park. Then animals move if they can. 

Before they leave for the night, guests will buy items from your store based on their experience. Next to two different species? Better get a photo book. Have an unobstructed view of a faraway animal? They'll buy binoculars.

After the 5-day week is over your zoo is complete and your score is the total amount guests spent at your store.

--

Pan with WASD or arrow keys.

Select your placement type and draw on the map with your mouse.

Scrollwheel or Q/E to zoom in and out.

-- 

Post-GGJ Bug Fixes

- Fixed the Binoculars scoring.

- Fixed issue that caused deleting animals if you started to place a fence over one, and then changed your placement type.
